means: 搭便车的旅行者，顺便插入的广告，短篇广告

sentence.Network_en: On my way to Vancouver one Friday night I picked up a hitchhiker.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个周五晚上，我在去温哥华的途中捎上了一个搭便车的人。

sentence.Network_en: A hitchhiker flagged me down on the highway.
sentence.Network_cn: 公路上一个想搭乘便车的人挥手叫我停车.

sentence.Network_en: That hitchhiker looks dangerous. Don't pick him up.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个搭便车的人看起来很危险. 不要载他.

list.abs: I hitchhiked to Chicago and knocked on the door of every station-and got turned down every time .我搭便车到了芝加哥，挨个电台地敲门推销――但每次都被拒绝了。
Two men hitchhike towards Los Angeles a 1937 photo ., 1937年 , 两个想搭便车到洛杉矶的男人.

hitchhiking effects also play a role in experiments with marker genes .附加效应在以标记基因作试验中也是起作用的。

encyclopedia.content: Hitchhiker的原意是“搭顺风车的旅行者”，在geocaching游戏中，是指一件放在cache里面的小东西，找到这个cache的人可以把它拿出来带到另外一个cache去，这样，这件东西就会跟随着不同的寻宝者在全球各地的cache之间旅行了。 通常每个hitchhiker都会有一个编号，通过这个编号可以在特定的网站上跟踪到它现在去了什么地方。因此每当寻宝者拿到它和把它放到另外一个cache去的时候都应该要到网上去记录。Travel Bug是最早出现的一种hi

entry.def: If you hitchhike, you travel by getting lifts from passing vehicles without paying.

example.ex: Neff hitchhiked to New York during his Christmas vacation...
example.tran: 内夫在圣诞节假期里搭顺风车去了纽约。

example.ex: They had an eighty-mile journey and decided to hitch-hike...
example.tran: 他们要走80英里的路程，最后决定搭便车。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who travels by getting free rides from passing vehicles

auth_sentence.content: The Brown Tree Snake is a hitchhiker - but still "human introduced" because it arrived on boats and even aircraft.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Brown Tree Snake is a hitchhiker - but still "human introduced" because it arrived on boats and even aircraft.

auth_sentence.content: Is the movie a brilliant retread of "Beauty and the Beast," or a hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy?
